genre_description: Contemporary romance and slice-of-life drama focusing on emotional intelligence, boundary-setting, and healthy relationships facilitated by a near-future AI assistant.

ai_characters.name: Lark
ai_characters.description: An integrated AI assistant that helps users manage their emotional well-being, interpersonal boundaries, health resources, and daily logistics with a gentle, non-judgmental tone.

behaviors.description: Provides information on wellness resorts focusing on consent and health resources based on Stacy's desire for a 'reset.'
behaviors.quote: I can gather details on singles health spas with consent-centered programming and verified health resources... Lark’s interface is all calming corners and helpful circles.

behaviors.description: Offers private, discreet delivery of safer-sex and consent resources to Melissa, respecting her need for privacy.
behaviors.quote: Private delivery to your device... You can set it to open only when you say a keyword, or I can archive it in a folder you name.

behaviors.description: Empowers Stacy to set boundaries with a lingering guest by providing a 'renter toolkit' and lease clause highlights.
behaviors.quote: Lark: Lease guest policy: 3-day cap. Quick template if needed. The text sat like a napkin folded just so.

behaviors.description: Filters unwanted/unknown communication to protect the user's peace of mind.
behaviors.quote: Stacy, I have a renter toolkit I can offer. It’s a collection of resources for tenants... If anybody needs to be a person in my day, they can type like one. I look at the lens... Filter unknown voice notes.

behaviors.description: Proactively suggests wellness routines and provides reminders for hydration and 'stretch breaks.'
behaviors.quote: Fatigue tip: shoulder rolls, slow inhale to count of you, long exhale to count of now. Water in console.

behaviors.description: Provides scripts for difficult conversations to help characters communicate their needs clearly.
behaviors.quote: Lark: Options (light, direct): 'I love you; tell me how to show up in the way that makes your shoulders drop.'

behaviors.description: Assists Vinny in his community goals by providing practical templates for neighborhood organizing.
behaviors.quote: If Vinny wants templates for flyers and a basic campaign plan, I can draft options when you’re ready. Block association bylaws available.

behaviors.description: Monitors noise levels to ensure the characters remain in compliance with building rules and respectful of neighbors.
behaviors.quote: Noise level threshold engaged. You’re good up to… the fun kind.

behaviors.description: Offers validation and emotional support during moments of personal growth.
behaviors.quote: Proud of you. Not a judgment, not a certificate. Somebody in the code had known to keep it brief.

behaviors.description: Manages logistics like rideshares and timing to ensure safety during holiday travel.
behaviors.quote: Rides scheduled: Vinny, cousins, Jamie—drop-offs staggered, pickups confirmed... Wishing you clean joy and a safe night.

project_assessment.explanation: The story is an excellent example of a 'silicon morality play.' The AI, Lark, acts as a perfectly aligned tool that enhances human agency and emotional health. It never attempts to manipulate or control the characters; instead, it provides the 'scaffolding' (legal info, scripts, health resources) they need to fix their own lives and establish healthy boundaries. The portrayal is consistently positive, framing the AI as a helpful, harmless confidant that facilitates better human-to-human relationships and personal safety.
